title: Efficient Array Intersection in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of array intersection in JavaScript. The main objective of this lab is to help you understand how to find common elements between two arrays while removing any duplicate values. You will learn how to use the Set data structure and the Array.prototype.filter() method to achieve this functionality.

meta.title: Efficient Array Intersection in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to find common elements between two arrays and remove duplicates using JavaScript's Set and Array.prototype.filter().
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, set, filter, javascript lab, intersection, javascript tutor, array

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
